title: how can i get 50 Rp
body: I was wondering if it's possible to get 50 RP for free because i need it to get my skin and im just missing 50 RP for it ? How can i get it ?

replies.body: You can reach out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do. No promises, though!
You always can sell nude pics or sell drugs is also a good option
Ask your parents to give you $5 or get a job or steal it. I don't recommend the latter.
